detail_desc: Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with an embroidered pattern. Deep V-neck, ties at the neckline, long wide raglan sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

Knee-length shirt dress in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Knee-length shirt dress in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short, flared skirt in sturdy jersey with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Double-layered waistband and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short, flared skirt in sturdy jersey with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Double-layered waistband and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved, V-neck top in a stretch weave. Lace trims around the neckline and sleeves and down the front.
Short-sleeved, V-neck top in a stretch weave. Lace trims around the neckline and sleeves and down the front.
Top in jersey with a sheen. The top has short, wide butterfly sleeves.
Top in jersey with a sheen. The top has short, wide butterfly sleeves.

Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a decorative lace trim at the top with a small bow at the front. Press-studs at the crotch and elastication around the hems.

Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a decorative lace trim at the top with a small bow at the front. Press-studs at the crotch and elastication around the hems.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and a round neckline with gathers at the front. Frill-trimmed hems and press-studs at the crotch.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and a round neckline with gathers at the front. Frill-trimmed hems and press-studs at the crotch.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons at the front, a chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Back in a glossy weave with an adjustable tab. Lined.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons at the front, a chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Back in a glossy weave with an adjustable tab. Lined.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons at the front, a chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Back in a glossy weave with an adjustable tab. Lined.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons at the front, a chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Back in a glossy weave with an adjustable tab. Lined.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons at the front, a chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Back in a glossy weave with an adjustable tab. Lined.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons at the front, a chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Back in a glossy weave with an adjustable tab. Lined.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons at the front, a chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Back in a glossy weave with an adjustable tab. Lined.

Coat in sturdy twill with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and three buttons at the front. Diagonal side pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a rounded lace collar and short puff sleeve. Press-studs at the back of the neck and at the crotch.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a rounded lace collar and short puff sleeve. Press-studs at the back of the neck and at the crotch.

Jacket in washed, stretch cotton denim with a reversible sequin motif on the back (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and embroidered text. Press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, and decorative pocket flaps with a press-stud at the front. Unlined.
Boxy-style cardigan in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Boxy-style cardigan in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Boxy-style cardigan in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Fitted,V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves, a seam below the bust and a twisted detail at the front to create a gently draped effect.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and long, slightly wider sleeves.

Straight-cut coat in wool with a detachable drawstring hood, concealed press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Long raglan sleeves, welt side pockets and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Sorts vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports top. Narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back. The sports top has an elasticated hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details. Relaxed fit with a regular waist, button fly and gently tapered legs.
5-pocket jeans in sturdy, washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, tapered legs with creases.
5-pocket jeans in sturdy, washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, tapered legs with creases.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave with glittery threads. Softly draping and flared with a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Trousers in a cupro weave with a high waist, pleats at the top for added width, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Long skirt in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and gently flared hem with a slit at the front. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Long skirt in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and gently flared hem with a slit at the front. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Long skirt in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and gently flared hem with a slit at the front. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Long skirt in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and gently flared hem with a slit at the front. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Long skirt in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and gently flared hem with a slit at the front. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping weave with buttons down the front and a high waist with partially stitched pleats down the front. Two slits at the front and one at the back. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping weave with buttons down the front and a high waist with partially stitched pleats down the front. Two slits at the front and one at the back. Unlined.

Shirt in washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves, cuffs with a press-stud fastening, and a rounded hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), a narrow trim around the neckline and flutter sleeves with overlocked edges.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), a narrow trim around the neckline and flutter sleeves with overlocked edges.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), a narrow trim around the neckline and flutter sleeves with overlocked edges.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), a narrow trim around the neckline and flutter sleeves with overlocked edges.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams and an elasticated waist.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams and an elasticated waist.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams and an elasticated waist.
Shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, print motif on one leg and contrasting colour trims.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist. Layered over short jersey inner leggings.
Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and short slits at the hems.
Short dress in a soft linen and viscose weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Short sleeves and a tapered waist with a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Short dress in a soft linen and viscose weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Short sleeves and a tapered waist with a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Clamdiggers in washed denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and a leg pocket. Key chain with a carabiner hook.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with embroidered hearts. Narrow, covered elastication and a decorative, twisted drawstring at the waist, and scalloped hems.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with embroidered hearts. Narrow, covered elastication and a decorative, twisted drawstring at the waist, and scalloped hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly with a button.
Tankini with contrasting colour trims. Top with print motifs on the front, one wide and one narrow shoulder strap and a lined front. Fully lined bottoms.
Fully lined swimsuit with a flounce at the top. V-neck with a sewn-on bow at the front and a seam at the waist.
Fully lined swimsuit with a flounce at the top. V-neck with a sewn-on bow at the front and a seam at the waist.
Fully lined swimsuits with an all-over print and spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Fully lined swimsuits with an all-over print and spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Flared, calf-length skirt in tulle with a flock print. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Swim trousers and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with short raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Swim trousers and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with short raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Swim trousers and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with short raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in an airy, organic cotton weave with buttons down the front and short raglan sleeves with overlocked edges.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular waist. Wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist and with a concealed key pocket. The polyester content of the tights is partly recycled.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, slub cotton jersey with a round neckline and buttons down the front. Flounces at the top that continue over the shoulders, and a gathered seam at the waist.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, slub cotton jersey with a round neckline and buttons down the front. Flounces at the top that continue over the shoulders, and a gathered seam at the waist.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular waist. Wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist and with a concealed key pocket. The polyester content of the tights is partly recycled.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, slub cotton jersey with elastication at the top and shoulder straps with a sewn-on bow. Broderie anglaise frill trim at the front and short legs with narrow elastication at the hems.
Joggers in soft, slightly stretchy denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Joggers in soft, slightly stretchy denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Joggers in soft, slightly stretchy denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Fully lined, seersucker bikini. Top with flounce-trimmed elasticated shoulder straps that cross at the back. Bottoms with elastication and a flounce at the waist.
